summary: This document is a sworn statement from a forensic accountant and private investigator hired by Cohen & Gresser LLP to independently review a Financial Condition Report prepared by Macalvins Accountants summarizing Ghislaine Maxwell's financial condition and assets from 2015-2020. The expert concludes the report is a complete and accurate summary of assets held by Ms. Maxwell, her husband, and assets held in trust for her benefit.

keyFacts: A forensic accountant with IRS-CID and FBI cross-designation experience was hired to independently review Ghislaine Maxwell's financial condition report.
The review covered assets held by Maxwell, her husband, and assets held in trust for Maxwell's benefit from 2015-2020.
The expert concluded the Financial Condition Report prepared by Macalvins Accountants was complete and accurate.
The expert had complete access to all underlying documents and could ask any questions pertinent to the analysis.
The engagement was commissioned by Cohen & Gresser LLP, indicating legal representation involvement in Maxwell's financial matters.
